mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_role, user_name, password) values (#{userId}, #{userRole}, #{userName}, #{password})
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_role , u.password, r.user_role_name from user u join user_role r on u.user_role = r.user_role where user_id = #{userId}
select user_id,password from user where user_id =#{userId}
